name: passninja-guestlist-gas
description: A repository for the PassNinja Google Apps Script demo to demonstrate PassNinja API functionality.

scripts.js2gs: for f in *.js; do mv -- "$f" "${f%.js}.gs"; done
scripts.gs2js: for f in *.gs; do mv -- "$f" "${f%.gs}.js"; done
scripts.build:docs:utils: jsdoc2md --files utils.general.js utils.sheet.js config.js errors.js virtualization.js > docs/UTILS.md
scripts.build:all: npm run build:docs:build && npm run build:docs:core && npm run build:docs:utils && npm run build:docs:api && npm run build:docs:fns
scripts.build:docs: cd src && npm run js2gs > /dev/null 2>&1 || npm run gs2js && npm run build:all && npm run js2gs && cd ..

hooks.pre-commit: npm run lint:fix && npm run test && git add .
hooks.pre-push: npm run lint && npm run test --coverage

author: PassNinja
